Trigger.name: damage done
Trigger.script:
if dprCount == nil then dprCount = 0 end
dprCount = (dprCount + tonumber(matches[2]))

Trigger.name: Taken collection
Trigger.script: if takenCount == nil then takenCount = 0 end takenCount = (takenCount + matches[2])

Alias.name: msdp.unreport
Alias.script: cecho("<blue>[ INFO ] -<grey> User manually invoked MSDP unreport.\n") msdp_unreport_all()

Alias.name: msdp.report
Alias.script: cecho("<blue>[ INFO ] -<grey> User manually invoked MSDP report.\n") msdp_report_all()

Alias.name: msdp.query
Alias.script: cecho("<blue>[ INFO ] -<grey> User manually invoked MSDP query.\n") msdp_query()

Action.name: Lock UI
Action.script: if containersLock then containersLock = false Adjustable.Container:doAll(function(self) self:unlockContainer() end) else containersLock= true Adjustable.Container:doAll(function(self) self:lockContainer() end) end

Action.name: Hide UI
Action.script: if containersLoad then containersLoad = false Adjustable.Container:doAll(function(self) self:minimize() end) else containersLoad= true Adjustable.Container:doAll(function(self) self:restore() end) end

ScriptGroup.name: Xaos_UI
ScriptGroup.script: --xaos stupid basic msdp enabled mudlet ui written by Noax --Published October 2020

ScriptGroup.name: MSDP
ScriptGroup.script:
msdp = msdp or {}
--Once MSDP is reporting data to the client you can utilize the data --via the reportables name eg. msdp.HEALTH or msdp.MANA (Capitalization --matters) I have configured an event for all currently active MSDP --reportables. Simply add code inside the function for the reportable --and have fun. I have included a simple UI and guages for an easy to --follow example (look in MSDP/Score/msdp.grab_HEALTH). most functions --and varibales live under the global msdp so that the Variables menu --is not crowded. Lastly, make sure you enable the script so that the --event can trigger the function in the script.

Script.name: msdp.grab_SERVER_ID
msdp.grab_SERVER_TIME
msdp.grab_SNIPPET_VERSION
Script.script:
--will report the code snippet version --unlikely to change, but you could code --a killswitch for if it does change? function msdp.grab_SNIPPET_VERSION()
end

Script.name: msdp.grab_CHARACTER_NAME
Script.script:
--reports character name --is not affected by fake character data function msdp.grab_CHARACTER_NAME()
end

Script.script:
--reports character id --is not affected by fake character data function msdp.grab_CHARACTER_ID()
end

Script.name: msdp.grab_LEVEL
msdp.grab_RACE
Script.script:
--will report rece --affected by fake character data function msdp.grab_RACE()
end

msdp.grab_HEALTH
Script.script:
--will report health function msdp.grab_HEALTH() UI.hpbar:show() UI.gauge_adjustment()
if msdp.HEALTH == nil or msdp.HEALTH_MAX == nil then return end
if UI.gauge_state[2] == true then local percent = math.floor((tonumber(msdp.HEALTH)/ tonumber(msdp.HEALTH_MAX)) * 100) UI.hpbar:setText("<center>♥<strong> " .. tostring(percent) .. "%") else UI.hpbar:setText("<center>♥<strong> " .. tostring(msdp.HEALTH) .. "/" .. tostring(msdp.HEALTH_MAX)) end UI.hpbar:setValue(tonumber(msdp.HEALTH), tonumber(msdp.HEALTH_MAX))
end

end

Script.name: msdp.grab_EXPERIENCE
Script.script:
--will report legacy experience function msdp.grab_EXPERIENCE() UI.expbar:show()
if msdp.EXPERIENCE == nil or msdp.EXPERIENCE_MAX == nil then return end
if UI.gauge_state[5] == true then local percent = math.floor((tonumber(msdp.EXPERIENCE)/ tonumber(msdp.EXPERIENCE_MAX)) * 100) UI.expbar:setText("<center>🌐<strong> " .. tostring(percent) .. "%") else UI.expbar:setText("<center>🌐<strong> " .. tostring(msdp.EXPERIENCE) .. "/" .. tostring(msdp.EXPERIENCE_MAX)) end
local current = msdp.EXPERIENCE local max = msdp.EXPERIENCE_MAX
if current < max then current = max end
UI.expbar:setValue(tonumber(current), tonumber(max))
end

msdp.grab_SPELLS
msdp.grab_TACTICS
msdp.grab_SHIELD_UNIT
Script.script:
--will report shielding unit stats as a table function msdp.grab_SHIELD_UNIT() if msdp.SHIELD_UNIT == "None" or msdp.SHIELD_UNIT == nil then --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>SHIELD_UNIT updated to:"..tostring(msdp.SHIELD_UNIT).."\n") UI.shieldbar:hide() UI.gauge_adjustment() return end
local curr = 0 local max = 0 --SHIELD_UNIT data comes in as a table so we need to iterate the table for k,v in pairs(msdp.SHIELD_UNIT) do curr, max = rex.match(v,[[^(\d+)\:(\d+)\:\d+\:\d+$]]) --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>SHIELD_UNIT updated to:"..tostring(v).."\n") end
UI.shieldbar:show() UI.gauge_adjustment()
if UI.gauge_state[1] == true then local percent = math.floor((tonumber(curr)/ tonumber(max)) * 100) UI.shieldbar:setText("<center>🛡<strong> " .. tostring(percent) .. "%") else UI.shieldbar:setText("<center>🛡<strong> " .. tostring(curr) .. "/" .. tostring(max)) end
UI.shieldbar:setValue(tonumber(curr), tonumber(max))
end

Script.name: msdp.grab_PARTY_MEM
Script.script:
--will report everyone in party as a table function msdp.grab_PARTY_MEM() --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM:
") --display(msdp.PARTY_MEM) --local id = 0 --local name = "" --local hp = 0 --local mana = 0 --local move = 0 --local guarding = "" --local guarded = "" --local c = 0 --local dump_watched = true --UI.lockedallybar:hide() --for i = 10, 18 do --UI.irbar[i]:hide() --end --UI.iroverflow2:hide() --if tonumber(UI.watched_ally) == 0 then --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: We need to adjust the bars to the left
") --UI.irbars_adjust2(true) --else --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: We do need to adjust the bars to the right
") --UI.irbars_adjust2(false) --end --for k,v in pairs(msdp.PARTY_MEM) do --c = c + 1 --id, name, hp, mana, move, guarding, guarded = rex.match(v,[[^(\d+)\:(.*)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\w+)\:(\w+)$]]) --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(id).. " for id
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(name).. " for name
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(hp).. " for hp
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(mana).. " for mana
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(move).. " for move
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(guarding).. " for guarding
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Rex gave "..tostring(guarded).. " for guarded
") --if tonumber(id) == 0 then --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Empty party
") --return; --end --if tonumber(id) == tonumber(UI.watched_ally) then --UI.lockedallybar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.set_watched_ally", 0) --UI.lockedallybar:setText("<center>🕱<strong> "..tostring(name).." ".. tostring(hp) .. "%") --UI.lockedallybar:setValue(tonumber(hp), 100) --UI.lockedallybar:show() --c = c - 1 --dump_watched = false --else --if tonumber(c) > 9 then --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: More in room then ir bars available
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>PARTY_MEM: Show the overflow label
") --UI.iroverflow2:show() --return; --end --UI.irbar[c + 9].text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.set_watched_ally", id) --UI.irbar[c + 9]:setText("<center>🕱<strong> "..tostring(name).." ".. tostring(hp) .. "%") --UI.irbar[c + 9]:setValue(tonumber(hp), 100) --UI.irbar[c + 9]:show() --end --end --if dump_watched then --UI.set_watched_ally(0) --end end

Script.name: msdp.grab_IN_ROOM
Script.script:
--will report everyone in the room's health and target as a table function msdp.grab_IN_ROOM() --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM:
") --display(msdp.IN_ROOM) local id = 0 local name = "" local hp = 0 local move = 0 local targetid = 0 local targetname = "" local enemy = "" local c = 0 for i = 1, 9 do UI.irbar[i]:hide() end UI.irbars_adjust1(true) UI.iroverflow1:hide() for k,v in pairs(msdp.IN_ROOM) do c = c + 1 --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: v contains "..tostring(v).. " for rex
") name, hp, move, targetid, targetname = rex.match(v,[[^(.*)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(.*)$]]) --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(name).. " for name
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(hp).. " for hp
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(move).. " for move
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(targetid).. " for target id
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(targetname).. " for target name
") if tostring(name) == "None" then --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>IN_ROOM: Rex gave "..tostring(name).. " for target name
") return end if tostring(targetname) == tostring(msdp.CHARACTER_NAME) then UI.irbar[c].front:setStyleSheet(UI.oppobarfrontStyleSheet) UI.irbar[c].back:setStyleSheet(UI.oppobarbackStyleSheet) UI.irbar[c]:setText("<center>🕱<strong> "..tostring(name).." ".. tostring(hp) .. "%") UI.irbar[c]:setValue(tonumber(hp), 100) else UI.irbar[c].front:setStyleSheet(UI.irbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.irbar[c].back:setStyleSheet(UI.irbarbackStyleSheet) UI.irbar[c]:setText("<center>🕱<strong> "..tostring(name).." ".. tostring(hp) .. "%") UI.irbar[c]:setValue(tonumber(hp), 100) end UI.irbar[c]:show() end end

Script.name: msdp.grab_FIGHTING
Script.script:
--will report the person your are fightings info function msdp.grab_FIGHTING() --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>FIGHTING:
") --display(msdp.FIGHTING) local id = 0 local name = "" local hp = 0 local move = 0 UI.fightingbar:hide() id, name, hp, move = rex.match(msdp.FIGHTING,[[^(\d+)\:(.*)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)$]]) --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>FIGHTING: Rex gave "..tostring(id).. " for id
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>FIGHTING: Rex gave "..tostring(name).. " for name
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>FIGHTING: Rex gave "..tostring(hp).. " for hp
") --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>FIGHTING: Rex gave "..tostring(move).. " for move
") if tonumber(id) == 0 then msdp.grab_IN_ROOM() else UI.fightingbar:show() UI.fightingbar:setText("<center>🕱<strong> "..tostring(name).." ".. tostring(hp) .. "%") UI.fightingbar:setValue(tonumber(hp), 100) end end

Script.name: msdp.grab_QUEST_LIST
Script.script: --will status of quests when in the room with a questmaster function msdp.grab_QUEST_LIST() --cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>QUEST_LIST:\n") --display(msdp.QUEST_LIST) if msdp.QUEST_LIST == "" then return end quests = {} for k,v in pairs(msdp.QUEST_LIST) do for q in rex.gmatch(tostring(v), [[(.+?\:\w+),]]) do table.insert(quests, q) end end for k1, v1 in pairs(quests) do quest = "" action = "" quest, action = rex.match(tostring(v1), [[(.+?):(\w+)]]) if tostring(action) == "request" then send("quest request " .. tostring(quest)) end if tostring(action) == "completed" then send("quest completed " .. tostring(quest)) end end end

Script.name: MSDP Setup
Script.script:
--ask for a list of commands, lists, and reportable variables that the server supports function msdp_query() cecho("<blue>
[ INFO ] -<grey> Querying Server for MSDP reportables.
") sendMSDP("LIST", "COMMANDS", "LISTS", "REPORTABLE_VARIABLES") --sendMSDP("LIST", "COMMANDS", "LISTS", "REPORTED_VARIABLES") tempTimer(2.5,function() msdp_check() end) end
function msdp_check() if msdp.REPORTABLE_VARIABLES then msdp_report_all() else cecho("<red>[ ERROR ] -<grey> MSDP REPORTABLE_VARIABLES table is nil.
") end end
function msdp_report_all() local timer = 0 for k,v in pairs(msdp.REPORTABLE_VARIABLES) do tempTimer(timer,function() sendMSDP("REPORT",v) end) timer = timer + 0.01 end tempTimer(timer, function () sendMSDP("LIST","REPORTED_VARIABLES") cecho("<blue>[ INFO ] -<grey> MSDP Report Complete: " .. timer .. "
") end) end
function msdp_unreport_all() local timer = 0 for k,v in pairs(msdp.REPORTABLE_VARIABLES) do tempTimer(timer,function() sendMSDP("UNREPORT",v) end) timer = timer + 0.01 end tempTimer(timer, function () sendMSDP("LIST","REPORTED_VARIABLES") cecho("<blue>[ INFO ] -<grey> MSDP Unreport Complete: " .. timer .. "
") end) end

Script.name: StyleSheets
GaugeArea
Script.script:
function UI.gauge_setup()
UI.gauge_state = UI.gauge_state or {false, false, false, false, false, false, false}
UI.watched_ally = 0
UI.bott_back = UI.bott_back or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "bott_back", x=0, y=0, width="100%", height="100%" },GUI.bottom)
UI.bott_back:lower()
UI.bott_v_con = UI.bott_v_con or Geyser.VBox:new( {name = "bott_v_container", x=0, y=0, width="100%", height="100%" },GUI.bottom)
UI.bott_h_row1 = UI.bott_h_row1 or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "bott_h_row1",},UI.bott_v_con)
UI.bott_h_row2 = UI.bott_h_row2 or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "bott_h_row2",},UI.bott_v_con)
UI.bott_h_row3 = UI.bott_h_row3 or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "bott_h_row3",},UI.bott_v_con)
UI.bott_h_row4 = UI.bott_h_row4 or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "bott_h_row4",},UI.bott_v_con)
--In Room Gauge(s) UI.fightingbar = UI.fightingbar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "fightingbar", h_stretch_factor=3.0 },UI.bott_h_row1)
UI.fightingbar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.oppobarfrontStyleSheet) UI.fightingbar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.oppobarbackStyleSheet) UI.fightingbar.text:setToolTip("Fighting", "10") --UI.fightingbar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("functionname",1) UI.fightingbar:hide()
UI.lockedallybar = UI.lockedallybar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "lockedallybar", h_stretch_factor=3.0 },UI.bott_h_row2)
UI.lockedallybar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.allybarfrontStyleSheet) UI.lockedallybar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.allybarbackStyleSheet) UI.lockedallybar.text:setToolTip("Shielding Unit", "10") --UI.lockedallybar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("functionname",1) UI.lockedallybar:hide()
UI.irbar = UI.irbar or {}
for i = 1,18 do local parent = UI.bott_h_row1 if i > 9 then parent = UI.bott_h_row2 end UI.irbar[i] = UI.irbar[i] or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "irbar"..i, },parent) if i > 9 then UI.irbar[i].front:setStyleSheet(UI.allybarfrontStyleSheet) UI.irbar[i].back:setStyleSheet(UI.allybarbackStyleSheet) UI.irbar[i].text:setToolTip("Ally", "10") else UI.irbar[i].front:setStyleSheet(UI.irbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.irbar[i].back:setStyleSheet(UI.irbarbackStyleSheet) UI.irbar[i].text:setToolTip("Opponent", "10") end UI.irbar[i]:hide() end
--In Room Overflow Labels UI.iroverflow1 = UI.iroverflow1 or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "iroverflow1", },UI.bott_h_row1) --UI.iroverflow1:setStyleSheet(UI.overflowStyleSheet) --UI.iroverflow1:setToolTip("Etc", "10") --UI.iroverflow1:echo("<left><strong>...", "18") UI.iroverflow1:hide()
UI.iroverflow2 = UI.iroverflow2 or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "iroverflow2", },UI.bott_h_row2) --UI.iroverflow2:setStyleSheet(UI.overflowStyleSheet) --UI.iroverflow2:setToolTip("Etc", "10") --UI.iroverflow2:echo("<left><strong>...", "18") UI.iroverflow2:hide()
--Shield Gauge UI.shieldbar = UI.shieldbar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "shieldbar", },UI.bott_h_row3)
UI.shieldbar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.shieldbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.shieldbar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.shieldbarbackStyleSheet) UI.shieldbar.text:setToolTip("Shielding Unit", "10") --UI.shieldbar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",1) UI.shieldbar:hide()
--HP Gauge UI.hpbar = UI.hpbar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "hpbar", },UI.bott_h_row3)
UI.hpbar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.hpbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.hpbar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.hpbarbackStyleSheet) UI.hpbar.text:setToolTip("Health", "10") --UI.hpbar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",2) UI.hpbar:hide()
--Mana Gauge UI.manabar = UI.manabar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "manabar", },UI.bott_h_row3)
UI.manabar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.manabarfrontStyleSheet) UI.manabar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.manabarbackStyleSheet) UI.manabar.text:setToolTip("Mana", "10") --UI.manabar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",3) UI.manabar:hide()
--Move Gauge UI.movebar = UI.movembar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "movembar", },UI.bott_h_row3)
UI.movebar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.movebarfrontStyleSheet) UI.movebar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.movebarbackStyleSheet) UI.movebar.text:setToolTip("Movement", "10") --UI.movebar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",4) UI.movebar:hide()
--Exp Gauge UI.expbar = UI.expmbar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "expmbar", },UI.bott_h_row4)
UI.expbar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.expbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.expbar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.expbarbackStyleSheet) UI.expbar.text:setToolTip("Experience", "10") --UI.expbar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",5) UI.expbar:hide()
--Hero Gauge UI.herobar = UI.herombar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "herombar", },UI.bott_h_row4)
UI.herobar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.herobarfrontStyleSheet) UI.herobar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.herobarbackStyleSheet) UI.herobar.text:setToolTip("Dings", "10") --UI.herobar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",6) UI.herobar:hide()
--Ascend Gauge UI.ascendbar = UI.ascendmbar or Geyser.Gauge:new( {name = "ascendmbar", },UI.bott_h_row4)
UI.ascendbar.front:setStyleSheet(UI.ascendbarfrontStyleSheet) UI.ascendbar.back:setStyleSheet(UI.ascendbarbackStyleSheet) UI.ascendbar.text:setToolTip("Ascension", "10") --UI.ascendbar.text:setDoubleClickCallback("UI.gauge_toggle",7) UI.ascendbar:hide()
end
function UI.gauge_adjustment()
if tostring(msdp.SHIELD_UNIT) == "None" or tostring(msdp.SHIELD_UNIT) == "" or msdp.SHIELD_UNIT == nil then UI.hpbar:move(0,0) UI.manabar:move("50%",0) UI.movebar:move("75%",0) UI.hpbar:resize("50%","100%") UI.manabar:resize("25%","100%") UI.movebar:resize("25%","100%") else UI.shieldbar:move(0,0) UI.hpbar:move("10%",0) UI.manabar:move("50%",0) UI.movebar:move("75%",0) UI.shieldbar:resize("10%","100%") UI.hpbar:resize("40%","100%") UI.manabar:resize("25%","100%") UI.movebar:resize("25%","100%") end
end
function UI.irbars_adjust1(to_left) local x = 0 for i = 1,9 do if to_left then if tonumber(i) == 1 then x = 0 else x = tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_x()) end UI.irbar[i]:move(x,0) else if tonumber(i) == 1 then x = UI.fightingbar:get_width() else x = tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_x()) end UI.irbar[i]:move(x,0) end end x = tonumber(UI.irbar[9]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[9]:get_x()) UI.iroverflow1:move(x,0) end
function UI.irbars_adjust2(to_left) local x = 0 for i = 10,18 do if to_left then if tonumber(i) == 10 then x = 0 else x = tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_x()) end UI.irbar[i]:move(x,0) else if tonumber(i) == 10 then x = UI.lockedallybar:get_width() else x = tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[i - 1]:get_x()) end UI.irbar[i]:move(x,0) end end x = tonumber(UI.irbar[9]:get_width()) + tonumber(UI.irbar[9]:get_x()) UI.iroverflow2:move(x,0) end
function UI.set_watched_ally(id) --had to write a function so that it could be set as a callback UI.watched_ally = id msdp.grab_PARTY_MEM() end
function UI.gauge_toggle(index) --flip the state if UI.gauge_state[index] == nil or UI.gauge_state[index] == false then UI.gauge_state[index] = true else UI.gauge_state[index] = false end
--force an update of the relevant gauge if tonumber(index) == 1 then msdp.grab_SHIELD_UNIT() elseif tonumber(index) == 2 then msdp.grab_HEALTH() elseif tonumber(index) == 3 then msdp.grab_MANA() elseif tonumber(index) == 4 then msdp.grab_MOVEMENT() elseif tonumber(index) == 5 then msdp.grab_EXPERIENCE() elseif tonumber(index) == 6 then msdp.grab_HERO_EXP() elseif tonumber(index) == 7 then msdp.grab_ASCEND_EXP() end
--cecho("<yellow>[ DEBUG ] - <grey>guage_state[" ..tostring(index) .. "]:"..tostring(UI.gauge_state[index]).."\n")
end

Script.name: event_handler
Script.script:
--script name and function name must match function event_handler(event,...) if event == "sysConnectionEvent" then UI.setup() elseif event == "sysDisconnectionEvent" then UI.dismantle() elseif event == "sysWindowResizeEvent" then end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowResizeEvent","event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent","event_handler")

Script.name: InfoTerm
rewrap_window
Script.script:
function rewrap_window() mWidth, mHeight = getMainWindowSize() fWidth, fHeight = calcFontSize("main") lBorder = getBorderLeft() rBorder = getBorderRight() nSize = mWidth - lBorder - rBorder wrap = (nSize / fWidth - 1) setWindowWrap("main",wrap) setWindowWrap("middle",wrap) GUI.bottom:connectToBorder("left") GUI.bottom:connectToBorder("right") GUI.middle:attachToBorder("right") GUI.middle:attachToBorder("left") GUI.middle:attachToBorder("bottom") GUI.middle:attachToBorder("top") GUI.middle:connectToBorder("right") GUI.middle:connectToBorder("left") GUI.middle:connectToBorder("top") GUI.middle:connectToBorder("bottom") echo("fwidth " ..fWidth.."fheight " ..fHeight.. " lBorder " ..lBorder.. " rBorder " ..rBorder.. " nSize " ..nSize.. " wrap " ..wrap) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("AdjustableContainerRepositionFinish", "rewrap_window")

Script.name: setup/dismantle
whatYouSent
Script.script:
function whatYouSent(eventName, commandSent) cecho("middle_term","<white>"..commandSent.."<grey>\n") end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDataSendRequest", "whatYouSent")

Script.name: lineHandler
Script.script:
function lineHandler(line)
local youGetHitRegEx = [[^.+ your .+\. \((\d+) dam\)$]] local youGetHit2RegEx = [[^.+ you\. \((\d+) dam\)$]] local youGotHit = false local youRollRegEx = [[^You roll to avoid (.*).$]] local youEasilyAvoidRegEx = [[^You easily avoid (.*).$]] local youSideStepRegEx = [[^You side-step (.*).$]] local youDodgeRegEx = [[^You dodge (.*).$]] local youDodged = false local theyRollRegEx = [[^(.*) rolls to avoid your (.*).$]] local theyEasilyAvoidRegEx = [[^(.*) easily avoids your (.*).$]] local theySideStepRegEx = [[^(.*) side-steps your (.*).$]] local theyDodgeRegEx = [[^(.*) dodges your (.*).$]] local theyDodged = false local otherRollRegEx = [[^(.*) rolls to avoid (.*)'s (.*).$]] local otherEasilyAvoidRegEx = [[^(.*) easily avoids (.*)'s (.*).$]] local otherSideStepRegEx = [[^(.*) side-steps (.*)'s (.*).$]] local otherDodgeRegEx= [[^(.*) dodges (.*)'s (.*).$]] local otherDodged = false local youRiposteRegEx = [[^You catch (.*) and send out a riposte!$]] local youGuardParryRegEx = [[^You guard parry (.*), forcing (.*) away!$]] local youParryRegEx = [[^You(.*)parry (.*) with (.*)$]] local youParried = false local theyRiposteRegEx = [[^(.*) catches your (.*) and ripostes back!$]] local theyGuardParryRegEx = [[^(.*) guard parries your (.*) forcing you back!$]] local theyParryRegEx = [[^(.*) parries your (.*) with (.*)$]] local theyParried = false local otherParryRegEx = [[^(.*) parries (.*)'s (.*) with (.)$]] local otherParried = false local youBlockRegEx = [[^You block (.*)'s (.*)$]] local youBlocked = false local theyBlockRegEx = [[^(.*) blocks your (.*)$]] local theyBlocked = false local youPhaseRegEx = [[^You phase to avoid (.*)'s (.*)$]] local youPhased = false local theyPhaseRegEx = [[^(.*) phases to avoid your (.*)$]] local theyPhased = false local youAbsorbRegEx = [[^Your (.*) absorb[\s] (.*)$]] local youAbsorbed = false local theyAbsorbRegEx = [[^(.*) absorb your (.*)$]] local theyAbsorbed = false local otherAbsorbRegEx = [[^(.*)'s (.*) absorb[\s] (.*)'s (.*)$]] local otherAbsorbed = false local youKineticRegEx = [[^(.*) intercepts (.*)'s attack!$]] local youKineticed = false local theyKineticRegEx = [[^(.*) intercepts your attack!$]] local theyKineticed = false local youOrbDeflectRegEx = [[^The Orb of Deflection deflects (.*)'s attack!$]] local youOrbDeflected = false local theyOrbDeflectRegEx = [[^The Orb (.*) Deflection deflects your attack!$]] local theyOrbDeflected = false local youOrbAbsorpRegEx = [[^Your the Orb of Absorption absorbs (.*)$]] local youOrbAbsorped = false local theyOrbAbsorpRegEx = [[^(.*)'s the Orb of Absorption absorbs your (.*)$]] local theyOrbAbsorped = false local youShieldBlockRegEx = [[^You block (.*)'s (.*) with (.*)!$]] local youShieldBlocked = false local youShieldDeflectRegEx = [[^You deflect (.*)'s (.*) with (.*), forcing (.*) away!$]] local theyShieldBlockRegEx = [[^(.*) blocks your (.*) with (.*)$]] local theyShieldBlocked = false local theyShieldDeflectRegEx = [[^(.*) deflects your (.*) with (.*), forcing you back!$]]
if youGotHitCount == nil then youGotHitCount = 0 end if theyShieldBlockedCount == nil then theyShieldBlockedCount = 0 end if youShieldBlockedCount == nil then youShieldBlockedCount = 0 end if youOrbAbsorpedCount == nil then youOrbAbsorpedCount = 0 end if theyOrbAbsorpedCount == nil then theyOrbAbsorpedCount = 0 end if theyOrbDeflectedCount == nil then theyOrbDeflectedCount = 0 end if youOrbDeflectedCount == nil then youOrbDeflectedCount = 0 end if theyKineticedCount == nil then theyKineticedCount = 0 end if youKineticedCount == nil then youKineticedCount = 0 end if theyAbsorbedCount == nil then theyAbsorbedCount = 0 end if youAbsorbedCount == nil then youAbsorbedCount = 0 end if youDodgedCount == nil then youDodgedCount = 0 end if theyDodgedCount == nil then theyDodgedCount = 0 end if youParriedCount == nil then youParriedCount = 0 end if theyParriedCount == nil then theyParrieidCount = 0 end if youBlockedCount == nil then youBlockedCount = 0 end if theyBlockedCount == nil then theyBlockedCount = 0 end if youPhasedCount == nil then youPhasedCount = 0 end if theyPhasedCount == nil then theyPhasedCount = 0 end if youDefendCount == nil then youDefendCount = 0 end
if rex.find(tostring(line), youGetHitRegEx) then youGotHit = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youGetHit2RegEx) then youoGotHit = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youDodgeRegEx) then youDodged = true --good elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youShieldBlockRegEx) then-- youShieldBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youShieldDeflectRegEx) then-- youShieldBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyShieldBlockRegEx) then-- theyShieldBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyShieldDeflectRegEx) then--good theyShieldBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youOrbAbsorpRegEx) then-- youOrbAbsorped = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyOrbAbsorpRegEx) then-- theyOrbAbsorped = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyOrbDeflectRegEx) then-- theyOrbDeflected = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youOrbDeflectRegEx) then-- youOrbDeflected = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyKineticRegEx) then-- good theyKineticed = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youKineticRegEx) then --good youKineticed = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherAbsorbRegEx) then otherAbsorbed = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyAbsorbRegEx) then theyAbsorbed = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youSideStepRegEx) then youDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youEasilyAvoidRegEx) then youDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youRollRegEx) then youDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyDodgeRegEx) then theyDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theySideStepRegEx) then theyDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyEasilyAvoidRegEx) then theyDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyRollRegEx) then theyDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherDodgeRegEx) then otherDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherSideStepRegEx) then otherDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherEasilyAvoidRegEx) then otherDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherRollRegEx) then otherDodged = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youRiposteRegEx) then youParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youGuardParryRegEx) then youParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youParryRegEx) then youParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyRiposteRegEx) then theyParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyGuardParryRegEx) then theyParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyParryRegEx) then theyParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), otherParryRegEx) then otherParried = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youBlockRegEx) then youBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyBlockRegEx) then theyBlocked = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youPhaseRegEx) then youPhased = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), theyPhaseRegEx) then theyPhased = true elseif rex.find(tostring(line), youAbsorbRegEx) then youAbsorbed = true end if youOrbed ==nil then youOrbed = 0 end
if youDodged then youDodgedCount = youDodgedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youGotHit then youGotHitCount = youGotHitCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 return elseif theyShieldBlocked then theyShieldBlockedCount = theyShieldBlockedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youShieldBlocked then youShieldBlockedCount = youShieldBlockedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youOrbAbsorped then youOrbAbsorpedCount = youOrbAbsorpedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyOrbAbsorped then theyOrbAbsorpedCount = theyOrbAbsorpedCount + 1 selecttCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyOrbDeflected then theyOrbDeflectedCount = theyOrbDeflectedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youOrbDeflected then youOrbDeflectedCount = youOrbDeflectedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyKineticed then theyKineticedCount = theyKineticedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youKineticed then youKineticedCount = youKineticedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif otherAbsorbed then selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyAbsorbed then theyAbsorbedCount = theyAbsorbedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youAbsorbed then youAbsorbedCount = youAbsorbedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyDodged then theyDodgedCount = theyDodgedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif otherDodged then selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youParried then youParriedCount = youParriedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyParried then theyParriedCount = theyParriedCount +1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLinie() return elseif otherParried then selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youBlocked then youBlockedCount = youBlockedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyBlocked then theyBlockedCount = theyBlockedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif youPhased then youPhasedCount = youPhasedCount + 1 youDefendCount = youDefendCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return elseif theyPhased then theyPhasedCount = theyPhasedCount + 1 selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() return else selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("middle_term") return end end

Script.name: defenseBar_setup
ez trigs
Script.script:
-- Jor'Mox's Command Line Simple Triggers and Aliases Script -- -- use /alias pattern >> commands to send to create an alias -- use /trigger pattern >> commands to send to create a trigger -- -- use * to indicate an argument or word(s) that must be provided -- use ? to indicate an argument or word(s) that is optional -- use %# to indicate the appropriately numbered argument or captured words -- use wait # to wait that many seconds, including decimal seconds, before continuing to the next command -- -- use /alias or /trigger to show a list of all aliases or triggers managed by this script -- use /delete alias # or /delete trigger # to delete that alias or trigger, using the number matching that shown on the list --
cmd_line = cmd_line or {data = {}} cmd_line.data.triggers = cmd_line.triggers or {} cmd_line.data.aliases = cmd_line.aliases or {} local script_aliases = script_aliases or {}
local runQueue function runQueue(fnc,tbl) local info = table.remove(tbl,1) if info then local run = function() fnc(info[2]) runQueue(fnc,tbl) end if info[1] ~= 0 then tempTimer(info[1], run) else run() end end end
local function doQueue(fnc,...) local tbl = {} local args = arg if type(arg[1]) == "table" then args = arg[1] end for k,v in ipairs(args) do if k % 2 == 1 and type(v) ~= "number" then table.insert(args,k,0) end end for k = 1,#args,2 do tbl[(k + 1) / 2] = {args[k],args[k+1]} end runQueue(fnc,tbl) end
function sendQueue(...) doQueue(send,...) end
function expandQueue(...) doQueue(expandAlias,...) end
local function parse_pattern(ptrn) ptrn = string.gsub(ptrn,"([^/])%*","%1(.*)") ptrn = string.gsub(ptrn,"^%*","(.*)") ptrn = string.gsub(ptrn,"([^/])%?","%1\\s*(.*)") ptrn = string.gsub(ptrn,"^%?%s*","(.-)\s*") ptrn = string.gsub(ptrn,"%s+\\s%*","\\s*") ptrn = "^" .. ptrn .. "$" return ptrn end
local function parse_cmds(cmds) cmds = string.split(cmds,"%s*;%s*") local str = "expandQueue(" local start, match, stop, tmp local comma = "" for k,v in ipairs(cmds) do if string.match(v,"wait [%d%.]+") then str = str .. comma .. string.match(v,"^wait ([%d%.]+)$") elseif string.match(v,"%%%d+") then tmp = "" for start, match, stop in string.gmatch(v,"(.-)%%(%d+)([^%%]*)") do tmp = tmp .. string.format([[%s" .. matches[%s] .. "%s]], start, match + 1, stop) end str = str .. comma .. [["]] .. tmp .. [["]] else str = str .. comma .. [["]] .. v .. [["]] end comma = "," end str = str .. ")" return str end
local function save_cmd() table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/mycmd_data.lua", cmd_line.data) end
local function check_duplicate(ptrn, is_trigger) local tbl local func if is_trigger then tbl = cmd_line.data.triggers func = killTrigger else tbl = cmd_line.data.aliases func = killAlias end
for i,v in ipairs(tbl) do if v[2] == ptrn then func(v[1]) cecho("middle_term",string.format("Existing %s with identical pattern has been replaced.",is_trigger and "trigger" or "alias")) table.remove(tbl,i) break end end end
local function make_item(ptrn, cmds, is_trigger, is_config) local pattern = parse_pattern(ptrn) local commands = parse_cmds(cmds) if not is_config then check_duplicate(ptrn,is_trigger) end if is_trigger then table.insert(cmd_line.data.triggers,{tempRegexTrigger(pattern,commands),ptrn,cmds}) else table.insert(cmd_line.data.aliases,{tempAlias(pattern,commands),ptrn,cmds}) end if not is_config then save_cmd() cecho("middle_term",string.format("New %s with pattern %s has been created.",is_trigger and "trigger" or "alias",ptrn)) end end
local function show_items(triggers) local tbl local str, strs = "alias", "aliases" if triggers then tbl = cmd_line.data.triggers str, strs = "trigger", "triggers" else tbl = cmd_line.data.aliases end if not tbl or table.is_empty(tbl) then cecho("middle_term","Sorry, you don't have any " .. strs .. ".\n") cecho("middle_term","Syntax for " .. strs .. ": /" .. str .. " pattern >> commands to send") cecho("middle_term","You can type '/" .. str .. " help' for additional information.") else for i,v in ipairs(tbl) do cecho("middle_term",string.format("%3s: %s >> %s",i,v[2],v[3])) end end end
local function delete_item(number, is_trigger) local info, func if is_trigger then info = table.remove(cmd_line.data.triggers,number) func = killTrigger else info = table.remove(cmd_line.data.aliases,number) func = killAlias end if info then func(info[1]) save_cmd() cecho("middle_term",string.format("%s number %s has been deleted.",is_trigger and "Trigger" or "Alias",number)) end end
local function load_cmd() local file = getMudletHomeDir().."/mycmd_data.lua" local tmp = {} cmd_line.data = {aliases = {}, triggers = {}} if io.exists(file) then table.load(file, tmp) for i,v in ipairs(tmp.triggers) do make_item(v[2],v[3],true,true) end for i,v in ipairs(tmp.aliases) do make_item(v[2],v[3],false,true) end end end
local function disp_help(cmd) if cmd == "trigger" then cecho("middle_term",[[Syntax for triggers: /trigger pattern >> commands to send Example: /trigger You are thirsty. >> drink decanter /trigger * walks in * >> strangle %1 ; wait 1.5 ; zap %1]]) else cecho("middle_term",[[Syntax for aliases: /alias pattern >> commands to send Example: /alias dt >> cast 'detect hidden' ; cast 'detect invis' Example: /alias ff ? >> cast 'fireball' %1]]) end cecho("middle_term",[[-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- use * to indicate an argument or word(s) that must be provided use ? to indicate an argument or word(s) that is optional use %# to indicate the appropriately numbered argument or captured words use wait # to wait that many seconds, including decimal seconds, before continuing to the next command
use /alias or /trigger to show a list of all aliases or triggers managed by this script use /delete alias # or /delete trigger # to delete that alias or trigger, using the number matching that shown on the list
NOTE: If you're having issues with multiple commands not working, please check your Settings > Input line and make sure your Command Separator is not a single ; ]]) end
local function config() for i,v in ipairs(cmd_line.data.triggers) do killTrigger(v[1]) end for i,v in ipairs(cmd_line.data.aliases) do killAlias(v[1]) end for i,v in ipairs(script_aliases) do killAlias(v) end load_cmd()
script_aliases = {} table.insert(script_aliases,tempAlias([[^/(alias|trigger) (.*) >> (.*)$]],[[raiseEvent("cmdMakeItem",matches[2],matches[3],matches[4])]])) table.insert(script_aliases,tempAlias([[^/(alias|trigger)$]],[[raiseEvent("cmdShowList",matches[2])]])) table.insert(script_aliases,tempAlias([[^/(alias|trigger) help$]],[[raiseEvent("cmdShowHelp",matches[2])]])) table.insert(script_aliases,tempAlias([[^/delete (alias|trigger) (\d+)$]],[[raiseEvent("cmdDeleteItem",matches[2],matches[3])]])) end
function cmd_line.event_handler(event,...) if event == "sysConnectionEvent" or event == "sysInstall" then config() disp_help(arg[1]) elseif event == "cmdMakeItem" then make_item(arg[2],arg[3],arg[1] == "trigger") elseif event == "cmdShowList" then show_items(arg[1] == "trigger") elseif event == "cmdDeleteItem" then delete_item(arg[2], arg[1] == "trigger") elseif event == "cmdShowHelp" then disp_help(arg[1]) end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent", "cmd_line.event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysInstall", "cmd_line.event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("cmdMakeItem", "cmd_line.event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("cmdShowList", "cmd_line.event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("cmdDeleteItem", "cmd_line.event_handler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("cmdShowHelp", "cmd_line.event_handler")

Variable.value: a maple carving of a dragon
